title: FS; T204 Ramly Tom Reilly SGC 30
author: 3-2-count

posts.post_title: FS; T204 Ramly Tom Reilly SGC 30
posts.post_content:
SGC 30 T204 Ramly Tom Reilly (St Louis) available for sale - $200 delivered w/ no added fee via Paypal

Cool back story on this one I'd like to share.

This is a card which was part of a large Ramly find that I uncovered a couple years ago. (roughly 100 of them) As you can see by the reverse it has some rather interesting marks. This was the last card at the bottom of the stack located in one of the many tobacco tins that all of these cards had been stored in since they were produced 100+ years ago. The rust from the tin transposed onto the card what I would call a tattoo per say. Kinda cool if you ask me!!

See pics below. Please let me know via PM or email if interested. And yes, the tobacco tin mentioned/shown will accompany the card. I think they're linked for life.

Thanks all,

Tony
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]
